participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and observant, often reflecting on the past.
participant_1.background: i have three children. i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Joyful and nostalgic, with a zest for life despite her age.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever.

content.text: i am 100 years old but i feel like i might live forever
I'm amazed of how many useless technics are around just for money and not for peoples usefullnes
i remember when nobody had a television and now there are alot of different televisions without and difference between them
